Description: String of fifteen hollow sheet-gold amulets, one in the form of a fly and the others in the form of ancestor-busts; cornelian bead at either end of the string; one bust-amulet is broken and not strung with the others.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.20
Published: J. L. Keith, Anthropoid Busts of Deir el Medineh and Other Sites and Collections (DIFAO 49, 2011), p. 333.
